name: Apple Chips
author: walkerkr
summary: These yummy cinnamon apple chips will disappear almost as quickly as you make them! They're perfect for healthy snacks and easy to take on the road. The secret is baking at a very low temperature for a long time, which dehydrates the apples.
ingredients: 2  Golden Delicious apples, cored and thinly sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 225 degrees F (110 degrees C)
Arrange apples slices on a metal baking sheet
Mix sugar and cinnamon together in a bowl; sprinkle over apple slices
Bake in the preheated until apples are dried and edges curl up, 45 minutes to 1 hour
Transfer apple chips, using a metal spatula, to a wire rack until cooled and crispy
